@txn Scenario Outline: Using RESTful API to lookup books by ISBN # org/test/restful.feature:14 Given catalogue with books # RestfulStepdefs.catalogue_with_books() When requesting url /books/978-1-78398-478-7 # RestfulStepdefs.requesting_url(String) Then status code will be 200 # RestfulStepdefs.status_code_will_be(int) And response content contains Orchestrating Docker # RestfulStepdefs.response_content_contains(String) 2016-07-13 21:41:05.031 INFO 5021 --- [ Test worker] o.s.jdbc.datasource.init.ScriptUtils : Executing SQL script from class path resource [packt-books.sql] 2016-07-13 21:41:05.032 INFO 5021 --- [ Test worker] o.s.jdbc.datasource.init.ScriptUtils : Executed SQL script from class path resource [packt-books.sql] in 0 ms.
